verses.verse: <S%H1945>"Come,<s%> everyone who <S%H6771>thirsts,<s%> to the <S%H4325>waters!<s%> <S%H3212>Come,<s%> he who has no <S%H3701>money,<s%> <S%H7666>buy,<s%> and <S%H398>eat!<s%> <S%H3212>Yes,<s%> come, <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> and <S%H2461>milk<s%> without <S%H3701>money<s%> and without <S%H4242>price.<s%>

Why do you <S%H8254>spend<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> for that which is not <S%H3899>bread?<s%> and your <S%H3018>labor<s%> for that which <S%H3808>doesn't<s%> <S%H7654>satisfy?<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> <S%H8085>diligently<s%> to <S%H398>me,<s%> and eat you that which is <S%H2896>good,<s%> and let your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6026>delight<s%> itself in <S%H1880>fatness.<s%>

<S%H5186>Turn<s%> your <S%H241>ear,<s%> and <S%H3212>come<s%> to <S%H8085>me;<s%> hear, and your <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H2421>live:<s%> and I will <S%H3772>make<s%> an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H539>you,<s%> even the sure <S%H2617>mercies<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>
<S%H5414>Behold,<s%> I have given him for a <S%H5707>witness<s%> to the <S%H3816>peoples,<s%> a <S%H5057>leader<s%> and <S%H6680>commander<s%> to the <S%H3816>peoples.<s%>

<S%H7121>Behold,<s%> you shall call a <S%H1471>nation<s%> that you <S%H3045>don't<s%> know; and a <S%H1471>nation<s%> that <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know you shall <S%H7323>run<s%> to <S%H3068>you,<s%> because of Yahweh your <S%H430>God,<s%> and for the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for he has glorified <S%H6286>you.<s%>"
<S%H1875>Seek<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> while he may be <S%H4672>found;<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> you on him while he is <S%H7138>near:<s%>

let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> his <S%H1870>way,<s%> and the <S%H205>unrighteous<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4284>thoughts;<s%> and let him <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and he will have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on <S%H430>him;<s%> and to our God, for he will <S%H7235>abundantly<s%> <S%H5545>pardon.<s%>
"For my <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> are not your <S%H4284>thoughts,<s%> neither are your <S%H1870>ways<s%> my <S%H1870>ways,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"For as the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are <S%H1361>higher<s%> than the <S%H776>earth,<s%> so are my <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H1361>higher<s%> than your <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and my <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> than your <S%H4284>thoughts.<s%>

For as the <S%H1653>rain<s%> comes <S%H3381>down<s%> and the <S%H7950>snow<s%> from the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and <S%H7725>doesn't<s%> return <S%H7301>there,<s%> but waters the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and makes it bring <S%H3205>forth<s%> and <S%H6779>bud,<s%> and <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> to the <S%H2232>sower<s%> and <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H398>eater;<s%>

so shall my <S%H1697>word<s%> be that goes <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of my <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> it shall not <S%H7725>return<s%> to me <S%H7387>void,<s%> but it shall <S%H6213>accomplish<s%> that which I <S%H2654>please,<s%> and it shall <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in the thing I sent it to <S%H7971>do.<s%>

For you shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> with <S%H8057>joy,<s%> and be led <S%H2986>forth<s%> with <S%H7965>peace:<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and the <S%H1389>hills<s%> shall break <S%H6476>forth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you into <S%H7440>singing;<s%> and all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>fields<s%> shall <S%H4222>clap<s%> their <S%H3709>hands.<s%>

Instead of the <S%H5285>thorn<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> the fir <S%H1265>tree;<s%> and instead of the <S%H5636>brier<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> the myrtle <S%H1918>tree:<s%> and it shall be to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for a <S%H8034>name,<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H226>sign<s%> that shall not be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>"
